verses.verse: Be you followers <WG3402> of me, even <WG2531> as I also <WG2504> am of Christ. <WG5547>
Now <WG1161> I praise <WG1867> you, brothers, <WG80> that you remember <WG3415> me in all <WG3956> things, and keep <WG2722> the ordinances, <WG3862> as I delivered <WG3860> them to you.

But I would <WG2309> have you know, <WG1492> that the head <WG2776> of every <WG3956> man <WG435> is Christ; <WG5547> and the head <WG2776> of the woman <WG1135> is the man; <WG435> and the head <WG2776> of Christ <WG5547> is God. <WG2316>
Every <WG3956> man <WG435> praying <WG4336> or <WG2228> prophesying, <WG4395> having <WG2192> his head <WG2776> covered, <WG2596> dishonors <WG2617> his head. <WG2776>

But every <WG3956> woman <WG1135> that prays <WG4336> or <WG2228> prophesies <WG4395> with her head <WG2776> uncovered <WG177> dishonors <WG2617> her head: <WG2776> for that is even <WG2532> all one <WG1520> as if she were shaven. <WG3587>

For if <WG1487> the woman <WG1135> be not covered, <WG2619> let her also <WG2532> be shorn: <WG2751> but if <WG1487> it be a shame <WG149> for a woman <WG1135> to be shorn <WG2751> or <WG2228> shaven, <WG3587> let her be covered. <WG2619>

For a man <WG435> indeed <WG3303> ought <WG3784> not to cover <WG2619> his head, <WG2776> for as much as he is the image <WG1504> and glory <WG1391> of God: <WG2316> but the woman <WG1135> is the glory <WG1391> of the man. <WG435>
For the man <WG435> is not of the woman: <WG1135> but the woman <WG1135> of the man. <WG435>
Neither <WG2542> <WG3756> was the man <WG435> created <WG2936> for the woman; <WG1135> but the woman <WG1135> for the man. <WG435>
For this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> ought <WG3784> the woman <WG1135> to have <WG2192> power <WG1849> on <WG1909> her head <WG2776> because <WG1223> of the angels. <WG32>
Nevertheless <WG4133> neither <WG3777> is the man <WG435> without <WG5565> the woman, <WG1135> neither <WG3777> the woman <WG1135> without <WG5565> the man, <WG435> in the Lord. <WG2962>
For as the woman <WG1135> is of the man, <WG435> even so <WG3779> is the man <WG435> also <WG2532> by the woman; <WG1135> but all <WG3956> things of God. <WG2316>
Judge <WG2919> in yourselves: <WG5213> <WG846> is it comely <WG4241> that a woman <WG1135> pray <WG4336> to God <WG2316> uncovered? <WG177>
Does not even <WG3761> nature <WG5449> itself <WG846> teach <WG1321> you, that, if <WG1437> a man <WG435> have long <WG2863> hair, <WG2863> it is a shame <WG819> to him?
But if <WG1437> a woman <WG1135> have long <WG2863> hair, <WG2863> it is a glory <WG1391> to her: for her hair <WG2864> is given <WG1325> her for a covering. <WG4018>
But if <WG1487> any <WG5100> man seem <WG1380> to be contentious, <WG5380> we have <WG2192> no <WG3756> such <WG5108> custom, <WG4914> neither <WG3761> the churches <WG1577> of God. <WG2316>
Now <WG1161> in this <WG5124> that I declare <WG3853> to you I praise <WG1867> you not, that you come <WG4905> together <WG4905> not for the better, <WG2909> but for the worse. <WG2276>

For first <WG4412> of all, when you come <WG4905> together <WG4905> in the church, <WG1577> I hear <WG191> that there be divisions <WG4978> among <WG1722> you; and I partly <WG3313> <WG5100> believe <WG4100> it.
For there must <WG1163> be also <WG2532> heresies <WG139> among <WG1722> you, that they which are approved <WG1384> may be made <WG1096> manifest <WG5318> among <WG1722> you.
When you come <WG4905> together <WG4905> therefore <WG3767> into <WG1909> one <WG3588> <WG846> place, this is not to eat <WG5315> the Lord's <WG2960> supper. <WG1173>

For in eating <WG5315> every <WG1538> one takes <WG4301> before <WG4301> other his own <WG2398> supper: <WG1173> and one <WG3739> <WG3303> is hungry, <WG3983> and another <WG3739> is drunken. <WG3184>

What? <WG1063> have <WG2192> you not houses <WG3614> to eat <WG2068> and to drink <WG4095> in? or <WG2228> despise <WG2706> you the church <WG1577> of God, <WG2316> and shame <WG2617> them that have <WG2192> not? What <WG5101> shall I say <WG2036> to you? shall I praise <WG1867> you in this? <WG5129> I praise <WG1867> you not.

For I have <WG2192> received <WG3880> of the Lord <WG2962> that which <WG3739> also <WG2532> I delivered <WG3860> to you, That the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> the same <WG846> night <WG3571> in which <WG3739> he was betrayed <WG3860> took <WG2983> bread: <WG740>

And when he had given thanks, <WG2168> he broke <WG2806> it, and said, <WG2036> Take, <WG2983> eat: <WG5315> this <WG5124> is my body, <WG4983> which <WG3588> is broken <WG2806> for you: this <WG5124> do <WG4160> in remembrance <WG364> of me.

After <WG5615> the same <WG5615> manner <WG5615> also <WG2532> he took the cup, <WG4221> when <WG3326> he had supped, <WG1172> saying, <WG3004> This <WG5124> cup <WG4221> is the new <WG2537> testament <WG1242> in my blood: <WG129> this <WG5124> do <WG4160> you, as oft <WG3740> as you drink <WG4095> it, in remembrance <WG364> of me.

For as often <WG3740> as you eat <WG2068> this <WG5126> bread, <WG740> and drink <WG4095> this <WG5124> cup, <WG4221> you do show <WG2605> the Lord's <WG2962> death <WG2288> till <WG891> <WG3757> he come. <WG2064>

Why <WG5620> whoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall eat <WG2068> this <WG5126> bread, <WG740> and drink <WG4095> this <WG5126> cup <WG4221> of the Lord, <WG2962> unworthily, <WG371> shall be guilty <WG1777> of the body <WG4983> and blood <WG129> of the Lord. <WG2962>
But let a man <WG444> examine <WG1381> himself, <WG1438> and so <WG3779> let him eat <WG2068> of that bread, <WG740> and drink <WG4095> of that cup. <WG4221>
For he that eats <WG2068> and drinks <WG4095> unworthily, <WG371> eats <WG2068> and drinks <WG4095> damnation <WG2917> to himself, <WG1438> not discerning <WG1252> the Lord's <WG2962> body. <WG4983>
For this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> many <WG4183> are weak <WG770> and sickly <WG732> among <WG1722> you, and many <WG2425> sleep. <WG2837>
For if <WG1487> we would judge <WG1252> ourselves, <WG1438> we should not be judged. <WG2919>
But when we are judged, <WG2919> we are chastened <WG3811> of the Lord, <WG2962> that we should not be condemned <WG2632> with the world. <WG2889>
Why, <WG5620> my brothers, <WG80> when you come <WG4905> together <WG4905> to eat, <WG5315> tarry <WG1551> one <WG240> for another. <WG240>

And if <WG1487> any <WG5100> man <WG444> hunger, <WG3983> let him eat <WG2068> at <WG1722> home; <WG3624> that you come <WG4905> not together <WG4905> to condemnation. <WG2917> And the rest <WG3062> will I set <WG1299> in order <WG1299> when <WG5613> I come. <WG2064>
